insert into certificate_type (certificate_serie_id, certificate_serie_name, name, cst_create, cst_modified, is_del) values (#{certificateSerieId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{certificateSerieName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cstCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cstModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{del,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update certificate_type set certificate_serie_id = #{certificateSerieId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, certificate_serie_name = #{certificateSerieName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cst_create = #{cstCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, cst_modified = #{cstModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_del = #{del,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, certificate_serie_id, certificate_serie_name, name, cst_create, cst_modified, is_del from certificate_type where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
